item.title: Bay Area Weekly Issue 3
item.description: Bay Area Weekly is maintained by @HagerHu , focus on the internet, technology, and startup. Reading original english article, make progress weekly. One Year of indie hacking A personal reflection on one year of indie hacking. Roehl Sybing shares his experiences, successes, and challenges, as well as insights and advice for others interested in pursuing a similar path. https://roehl.dev/blog/one_year_of_indie_hacking/ Make progress with systems Discusses the importance of setting goals and developing systems to achieve them.
